Estimate descriptive statistics for each sample

Source: R/scmethrix_operations.R
get_stats.Rd

Estimate descriptive statistics for each sample

get_stats(scm = NULL, per_chr = TRUE)

Arguments

scm

scMethrix; the single cell methylation experiment
per_chr

Estimate stats per chromosome. Default TRUE

Value

data.table of summary stats

Details

Calculate descriptive statistics (mean, median, SD) either by sample or per_chr

Examples

data('scMethrix_data')

#Get stats for each sample and chromosome
get_stats(scMethrix_data)

#> Getting descriptive statistics...
#> Finished in 0.52s
#>     Chr Sample_Name mean_meth median_meth  sd_meth
#> 1: chr1          C1  68.81720         100 46.57508
#> 2: chr1          C2  72.50000         100 44.93314
#> 3: chr1          C3  72.77228         100 44.45489
#> 4: chr1          C4  74.73684         100 43.06952
#> 5: chr2          C1  67.61364         100 46.13808
#> 6: chr2          C2  71.08434         100 44.93931
#> 7: chr2          C3  64.53488         100 47.81476
#> 8: chr2          C4  54.16667         100 49.82399

#Get stats for each sample
get_stats(scMethrix_data,per_chr = FALSE)

#> Getting descriptive statistics...
#> Finished in 0.46s
#>    Sample_Name mean_meth median_meth  sd_meth
#> 1:          C1  68.23204         100 46.23817
#> 2:          C2  71.77914         100 44.80300
#> 3:          C3  68.98396         100 46.08938
#> 4:          C4  65.08380         100 47.36149
